mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pass, name, email) values(#{id},#{pass},#{name},#{email})
mapper.update: update member set pass=#{pass}, email=#{email} where member_idx=#{member_idx}
mapper.delete: delete from member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass}
